architectural_notes: Calculator web application with standard arithmetic operations
known_issues: Current calculator functionality does not match user expectations for Android-style calculator experience

existing_features.title: Create a 3D game environment using Three.js and React Three Fiber featuring Ram as the main playable character
Implement player controls for Ram character movement using keyboard inputs (WASD or arrow keys)
Create a combat system with basic attack mechanics for Ram including melee attacks triggered by spacebar or mouse click
Add enemy characters (demons/asuras) that spawn in the game world and can engage in combat with Ram
Implement health system for both Ram and enemies with visual health bars
Display game HUD showing Ram's health, current score, and level
Create a game start screen with title, play button, and instructions for controls
Implement game over state when Ram's health reaches zero with option to restart
Design and implement a cohesive visual theme inspired by Indian mythology with warm earthy tones (saffron, gold, deep red), traditional patterns, and epic atmosphere suitable for Ram's story

Replace the Ram character with a customizable player character system allowing players to choose between three hero types: mercenary, futuristic cyborg, or urban rebel, with distinct 3D models and visual styles

Transform the game environment from the current mythology-themed setting into a selectable map system with three distinct 3D environments: tropical island (Bermuda-style), neon-drenched cyberpunk city, or post-apocalyptic wasteland

Implement unique gameplay mechanics differentiators including increased movement speed system, hero-specific special abilities (one per character type), and drivable mech vehicles that spawn on the map

Replace Indian mythology visual theme with a modern battle royale aesthetic featuring neutral UI colors, contemporary fonts, and action-shooter styling appropriate for the mercenary/cyborg/rebel setting
Rename the project from 'Ram Play' to a title appropriate for a 3D battle royale shooter game

Replace the existing 3D battle royale game with a calculator application featuring a clean numeric keypad interface with digits 0-9, basic arithmetic operators (+, -, ×, ÷), equals button, clear button, and a display showing the current input and calculation result

Design and implement a modern, minimalist visual theme for the calculator with clean typography, subtle shadows, and a professional color scheme using neutral tones with accent colors for operation buttons
Add backspace/delete button to remove the last entered digit from the current input, positioned next to the clear button
Implement continuous calculation mode where pressing an operator after equals continues calculation with the result (e.g., '5 + 3 = 8', then '+ 2' continues from 8 to get 10)
Add percentage (%) button functionality that converts the current number to a percentage of the previous operand in calculations
Improve the calculator display to show both the calculation expression (e.g., '125 + 75') in a smaller font above and the result or current input in larger font below, similar to Android calculator
Add plus/minus (±) toggle button to switch between positive and negative numbers for the current input
Implement operator button highlighting that shows which operation is currently pending/active with a distinct visual state

Enhance button layout and sizing to match Android calculator proportions with larger number buttons arranged in a 4x4 grid (including 0 spanning two columns) and operation buttons in a vertical column on the right
Add subtle button press animations and haptic-style visual feedback (scale/shadow effects) when buttons are clicked to match Android calculator responsiveness

new_feature_requests.summary: Create a basic calculator application with standard arithmetic operations
Implement calculator logic in the backend actor to handle arithmetic operations, maintaining calculation state including current operand, pending operation, and result
Upgrade calculator to match Android phone calculator functionality and user experience
